text: Aur agar tum aurton ko iss say pehlay tallaq dey do kay tum ney unhen haath lagaya ho aur tum ney unn ka mehar bhi muqarrar ker diya ho to muqarrar mehar ka aadha mehar dey do yeh aur baat hai kay woh khud moaf ker den ya woh shaks moaf ker dey jiss kay haath mein nikkah ki girah hai tumhara moaf ker dena taqwa say boht nazdeek hai aur aapas ki fazeelat aur buzrugi ko faramosh na kero yaqeenan Allah Taalaa tumharay aemaal ko dekh raha hai
